Estimate1317
1 New Construction Home assumes all Plywood to be installed by Contractor and Nailed per FBC
3 Dry in all areas using Sharkskin Ultra SA Peel and Stick Underlayment
roof an additional layer of peel and stick will be added from 2 below the new penetration all the way to the first Hip or Ridge to
In all areas a wall adjoins the roof the underlayment will run 4 up the side or head wall junction
Flat Roof section to receive tapered Rigid Insulation board properly secured onto deck to create a 1812 pitch away from
1 Layer of Sharskin Ultra SA Peel and Stick to be applied over Insulation Board up the walls 4 inches and behind drip edge
Capped with GAF EverGuard TPO Roofing to be rolled behind drip and 4 up walls and under reglet at walls
1 Furnish and install all related Flashings to be made from 16 oz Copper and installed using Copper Nails
Birdstop or Eave Closure is to be installed above the drip edge this trim has weep holes every 12 to allow any water
All Sidewall Flashing to be double layered 1st flashing installed on top of first layer of Underlayment with second layer
of underlayment to cover the flashing 2nd layer of flashing installed on top of tile to guarantee positive drainage
Lead Flashings 30x30 to be installed at transitions from Valley to Roof
Page 1 Estimate 1317
2 Tile is to be roof loaded onto the roof of the home by SCGs Supplier of Choice Driveway must be clear on day of roof load
3 Furnish and install a Concrete Plantation Roof Tile White Slurry Coated
4 Tile to be installed using 212 Long 304 grade stainless steel screws
5 Hip and Ridge Trim Tile to be installed using ICP APOC Foam Tile Adhesive in any areas where it is impossible to use a screw
6 Color Matched Mortar to be used cosmetically on Hip and Ridge and other areas requiring extra closure
7 All Valleys and Associated Trim Intersections to be sealed using Mastic Brand Butyl sealant to assure water tightness
9 Furnish and install Lead Pipe Flashing Boots on all plumbing pipes Flange of Lead Boot to be Peel and Sticked to ensure seal to
10 Furnish and install Custom 16 oz Copper Gooseneck Vents and 4 Off Ridge Vents on all existing locations
Upon completion of the job you will receive a 7 yr Citrus Roofing and Construction LLC Guarantee that the roof will not leak
Payments to be made in 3 increments
